org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateChangeListener

    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.service  

    • Uses of ServiceStateChangeListener in org.apache.hadoop.service

      Classes in org.apache.hadoop.service that implement ServiceStateChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LoggingStateChangeListener
      This is a state change listener that logs events at INFO level
      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.service with parameters of type ServiceStateChangeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void AbstractService.registerGlobalListener(ServiceStateChangeListener l)
      Register a global listener, which receives notifications from the state change events of all services in the JVM
      void AbstractService.registerServiceListener(ServiceStateChangeListener l) 
      void Service.registerServiceListener(ServiceStateChangeListener listener)
      Register a listener to the service state change events.
      static boolean AbstractService.unregisterGlobalListener(ServiceStateChangeListener l)
      unregister a global listener.
      void AbstractService.unregisterServiceListener(ServiceStateChangeListener l) 
      void Service.unregisterServiceListener(ServiceStateChangeListener listener)
      Unregister a previously registered listener of the service state change events.
